key.name: hide-activities
key.summary: Put the Activities button inside Slingshot
key.description: Removes the Activities button from the top bar and puts it inside the applications menu.

key.name: disable-activities-hotspot
key.description: Disables the top left hotspot (that triggers the Activities mode).

key.name: show-categories
key.description: Clasifies the applications in categories, instead of showing them all mixed.

key.name: show-first
key.summary: Show main button first in top bar
key.description: When showing both Activities and Application button, put slingshot's button first.

key.name: icon-size
key.description: Specify the size for the icons in pixels.

key.name: key-binding
key.description: Keybinding to expand and show the menu.

key.name: menu-button
key.description: Allows to customize the menu button
